name: Dragons Raid
description:
Top-down endless shooter inspired by the 8-bit era hit "RiverRaid"... but with dragons :). Choose a dragon and fly ahead to beat your (or someone else's) hi-score. Adjust your speed to use different forms of attack. Upgrade your Dragon on the way, or not, as upgrades cost you points, and in effect, lowering your end score.

Please feel free to leave a comment.

Minimum requirements: win 64bit, 440mb free HDD space, GTX 750 graphics card or equivalent, i3 CPU or equivalent.

Ver 1.0 released 30/08/2021
